actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to increase the recruitment and retention of school counselors, school social workers, and school psychologists by low-income local educational agencies.
short_title: Increasing Student Achievement by Increasing Student Support Act

titles.title: Increasing Student Achievement by Increasing Student Support Act
A bill to increase the recruitment and retention of school counselors, school social workers, and school psychologists by low-income local educational agencies.
